page.title: 16Page 16 Events-The Last Week
page.content: THURSDAY- The Farewell Evening began at 8.00pm and about 70 staff(present and past),parents,governors,trustees, County staff and friends of Goring Heath School gathered in the school for an excellent buffet and punch cup. The headmaster and his wife were presented with a slide projector and screen,a crystal decanter,bouquet of flowers,card and a framed picture of the school and chapel from the parents and friends. The last item came from ex-pupils in the Photographic Club of the Secondary School(Langtree). The evening was a very happy occasion tinged with sadness about the school closing. The Henley Standard reporter(local newspaper) was present to photograph and record the event. He also inter- viewed a former pupil of 1919(page 7).
